participant_1.background:
I spend a lot of time reading and researching weird and wonderful things.
I spend my weekends learning about the universe.
i have ink stains on all my shirts.
i like reading mystery novels.
I'd love to explore the country side with my lifted Chevy truck and practice my Italian.

participant_2.background:
I don't see colors very well, but I can still chop vegetables and follow recipes.
i live in a condo.
I am working too much and not spending enough time with my family.
my father and grandfather also worked in the circus.
I have a computer that can play rap music loudly so I can dance with my dog.

content.text: Hey, what's up!
Not much, just working through some recipes.  How about you?
I'm reading about the universe, trying to learn more about it.
That's really cool!  Have you seen any cool space stuff lately?
There's a new telescope that was just launched that can see way further than any of the others.
Wow!  That's awesome!  I'm going to have to look that up.
I think it's really cool that we can learn about things so far away.
Yeah, it's amazing what we've been able to accomplish.
I'd love to explore the countryside with my lifted Chevy truck and practice my Italian.
That sounds like a lot of fun!  I've never been to Italy.
I'd love to go sometime, but I'm not sure when I'll be able to make it.
Maybe you'll get to go someday!
I hope so!
Have you ever been to the circus?
I've never been to the circus, but I've always wanted to go.
My father and grandfather both worked in the circus, so I grew up going to the circus a lot.
That's really cool!  I've heard that it's a lot of fun.
It is!  I have a lot of good memories of going to the circus.
I'm glad to hear that!
I'm going to go finish cooking dinner now.
Okay, have fun!
Thanks!  You too!
